name: Card Generator
description:
Welcome to Card Generator!


Create Beautiful, Highly Customizable Cards with a few clicks. Best part about it... each card comes with Auto-layout sections meaning it is highly customizable the once created.


Enjoy a hassle free, intuitive UI to generate your favorite card component and use it in your designs.


Custom properties include but not limited to text content, images, color, background, and border.


Any suggestions to improve the application are welcomed. Enjoy üëç
